name: Mac & Cheese
description: Creamy cheddar cheese mixed with perfectly cooked macaroni, topped with crispy breadcrumbs. A classic comfort food.

name: Paneer Pizza
description: Paneer pizza blends Italian and Indian flavors, with a crispy crust, tomato sauce, mozzarella, and spiced paneer for a savory fusion.

name: Dosa
description: Dosa Sambar is a popular South Indian dish featuring a crispy dosa made from fermented rice and lentil batter, served with tangy, spiced sambar.

name: Biryani
description: Biryani is a fragrant and flavorful rice dish cooked with spices, herbs, and vegetables.

name: Veggie Burger
description: A juicy veggie patty served on a whole grain bun with lettuce, tomato, and a tangy sauce.

name: Idli
description: A popular breakfast food in South India, it offers a unique blend of flavors with coconut chutney.

name: Dhokla
description: Dhokla is a savoury spongy Gujarati dish that is made with a fermented batter that is steamed to a cake-like consistency.

name: Veg. Momos
description: Veg momos are savory Tibetan dumplings filled with a mix of finely chopped vegetables, wrapped in dough and steamed, often served with a dipping sauce.

name: Cupcake
description: Indulge in a decadent treat with moist, rich chocolate cake topped with velvety frosting, perfect for satisfying sweet cravings.

name: Vegan healthy food
description: A hearty bowl filled with quinoa, roasted veggies, avocado, and a tahini dressing.

name: Chhole-Bhature
description: A Northern areas delicacy combination of chana masala and bhatura, a deep-fried bread made from maida.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Indulge in a decadent chocolate cake infused with rich coffee flavors, a perfect blend of sweetness and boldness in every bite.

name: Tandoori Paneer Tikka
description: It is an Indian dish made from chunks of paneer in spices and grilled in a tandoor.

name: Pav Bhaji
description: Pavi Bhaji is very famous in Mumbai which consisting a thick spicy vegetable curry served with a soft buttered bread roll.

name: Chocolate Brownie
description: A rich and fudgy brownie, topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and chocolate sauce.

name: Samosa
description: A popular Indian snack filled with spiced potatoes and peas, perfect for a flavorful snack.

name: Manchurian
description: A beloved Indo-Chinese delicacy featuring vegetable balls in a zesty, spicy sauce, harmonizing diverse textures and flavors for an exceptional dining delight.

name: Chilli Paneer
description: It is a popular Indo-Chinese dish where cubes of fried crispy paneer are tossed in a spicy sauce made with soy sauce, vinegar, chili sauce.

name: Lemon Cheesecake
description: A creamy cheesecake with a tangy lemon flavor, served on a crumbly biscuit base.

name: Maggie
description: Known for its instant soups and noodles, blending convenience with quality ingredients and bold flavors to satisfy cravings swiftly and deliciously.
